txt.en: 'We have just gotten word from Rivendell that Master Elrond wishes to speak with you. I know not what about, but I have found it is best not to keep powerful Elf-lords waiting.'
'It is good you have come. We are in dark times, and there is much to do. I have heard of your deeds in Evendim and believe you can help bring a light to these lands as well.'
'You should go at once to Rivendell and speak with Master Elrond.'
Rivendell is nestled hidden in a valley in the east of the Trollshaws.
You have been called to Rivendell, in the Trollshaws, for there is much to do there.

'It is good you have come. These are dark times, and there is much to do. Your deeds in Evendim were well-considered, and I believe you can help bring a light to these lands as well. We are fortunate you recovered from your wound at Dagorlad when you did, though it took these many years.'
